Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1965...
Injured on 5/8/1966 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/8/1967 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/5/1967 with a Pulled Tricep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/30/1969 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Released by Cleveland on 7/23/1970...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/1/1971 to a 3-year deal worth $2,200,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1971...
Had first career hit on 7/11/1971, off Steve D. Barber (NYM)...
